name: Project Lunatar
description: Project Lunatar (working title) is an ASCII-roguelite featuring RPG mechanics and procedurally generated content. I started building this game after rediscovering an old tech demo of mine that I never really did anything with. I decided to rework the entire thing from scratch to see how far I could get with it and while it still isn't complete by any means, I decided to publish what I have so far in the hopes that I'll get some constructive feedback to put towards upcoming content updates.
